Interface TruffleOptionDescriptors

All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<OptionDescriptor>, OptionDescriptors
public interface TruffleOptionDescriptors extends OptionDescriptors
An OptionDescriptors enhanced to provide a sandbox policy for options.
Since:
23.0
